comments.comment: The very first thing Ciphey does is check for no input, why does it say ~4 seconds for Cipheys main() to first run? :(
Can we have a trace output? I cannot repro, and this is running through cygwin, which is known to cause some performance problems!
That also looks like some form of initialisation issue, probably fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/issues/116>#116</denchmark-link>

On further talks with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/michalani>@michalani</denchmark-link> , we confirmed this is an instance of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/issues/116>#116</denchmark-link> . Closing in favour of that issue.
